attributes.action: Very long prison sentences for Rioters
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to register the general, overall and complete level of disgust that the majority of honest, decent UK citizens feel with the disgraceful actions of those who have rioted in London, Birmingham and Liverpool.

This petition is to register that the general public do not, and will not, accept this behaviour and that we believe this people should have the maximum penalties that the law can apply
